name: European Alliance for Social Sciences and Humanities
memberOrga: EASSH has no individual membership but only disciplinary organisations and universities. All our members are on our website http://www.eassh.eu/members
goal: EASSH is an umbrella organisation for research policy in the field of Social Sciences and Humanities
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: EASSH is engaged with science policy field. EASSH is involved with Open Science, European Research Area and Research infrastructures
